Name: Virtual Reality Girls 2
About the game: Virtual Reality Girls 2 is experience which will let you feel like real millionaire, delighted fast car and living inside amazing apartment. All this with company of the beautiful girls. Thanks to perfectly mapped motions of women body using motion capture technology and high quality 3d models we managed to deliver realistic experience of being with women. If you need some rest you can relax and watch one of the beautiful girls dancing. features: - unique music - high quality 3d models - different types of dance - Game designed for virtual reality with full support of roomscale
